snippet: At the harassment trial of Genevieve Sabourin, Alec Baldwin testified she had arrived uninvited at his East Hampton mansion in March 2012 and ruined his marriage proposal.
abstract: Actor Alec Baldwin testifies at harassment trial of Genevieve Sabourin, woman he says has been stalking him, that she arrived uninvited at his East Hampton mansion in March 2012 and ruined his marriage proposal to his wife; says he never had a romantic or sexual relationship with Sabourin and met with her only once, as a favor to a friend, to counsel her about an acting career.
lead_paragraph: At the harassment trial of Genevieve Sabourin, Alec Baldwin testified she had arrived uninvited at his East Hampton mansion in March 2012 and ruined his marriage proposal.

headline.main: In Court, Baldwin Tells of Stalker ‘Out of Hitchcock’
headline.print_headline: In Court, Baldwin Tells of Stalker ‘Out of Hitchcock’
